long_description: Introduce the great outdoors to young kids and start a lifelong tradition of enjoying nature. Author: Jeff Alt. Softcover; 228 pages; black-and-white photographs. Beaufort Books; copyright 2013. Learn how to accommodate children's needs while hiking and how to adapt your plans to include kids of all ages. Includes helpful checklists of what to pack for short day hikes or extended trips. Advice on safety, trip-planning and kid-friendly menus help you prepare for every situation.
short_description: Introduce the great outdoors to young kids and start a lifelong tradition of enjoying nature. Get Your Kids Hiking! helps teach you how to stay safe and have fun while hiking as a family.
